text:
I have 2 child learning piano from Ms Joanna. I'm so pleased that my elder child have completed her grade 8 (abrsm) with her patient & fruitful guidance. Hopefully my younger child will complete grade 8 in future.
A million thanks to Ms Joanna.
Thank you to Ms Joanna for her kind patience & guidance. From Knowing the ABCs of piano to performing a mini duet with her, I feel very happy. Big thanks to her. ðŸ˜€
Joanna is an amazing teacher. Very patient and kind with my daughter. And she also motivated an old student in me to start back up!

I have been taking beginnerâ€™s lesson as an older adult for 2years with Joanna. She is an awesome, utterly patient and an encouraging accredited music teacher. I have been to other piano schools but none of the teachers ever introduced if they are accredited to teach. There was one that left me dreading to return for another lesson. Whereas, after the  1st lesson with Joanna, I have become more interested and reading scores were not as arduous. I need more practice as I am a senior but it has become a joy more than a chore.

My child has been with Joanna for years and she has helped my daughter to obtain Grade 6 ABSRM practical and Grade 5 in theory.  She is a wonderful piano teacher and will guide accordingly to the child's progress.
